short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make de-listing Steam Community Market items a bazillion times easier with this simple extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple and light extension which only purpose is to make Steam Market listings removal a lot easier and faster.

 - Works with all steam market items
 - Easy to use
 - Faster than other methods
 - Executes on a single site
 - Free and no ads nor data gathering

[Here is the github repo](https://github.com/gelatinadenaranja/ListingsBGone)
